entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as speaking in an offhand voice and expressing his thoughts about being an Auror.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as fervently agreeing with Ron that it would be cool to be an Auror.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as expressing her thoughts about being an Auror and wanting to do something worthwhile.

entities.name: auro r
entities.description: Auror is mentioned as a job title that Ron and Harry are interested in.

entities.name: s.p.e.w.
entities.description: S.P.E.W. is mentioned as an organization that Hermione wants to take further.

entities.name: professor binns
entities.description: Professor Binns is mentioned as a ghost teacher who teaches History of Magic.

entities.name: history of magic
entities.description: History of Magic is mentioned as the most boring subject ever devised by Wizard-kind.

relationships.description: Ron expresses his interest in being an Auror.
Harry also expresses his interest in being an Auror.
Hermione wants to take S.P.E.W. further.
Ron and Harry carefully avoid looking at each other.
Professor Binns teaches History of Magic.
